name: The Endless Summer Surfing Challenge
description: If you own The Endless Summer Search For Surf you don't need to buy this game. For everyone else, welcome to the most exciting realistic surfing physics simulation challenge game you ever had the opportunity to play. Surf your way through the 12 surf spots of increasing difficulty. Complete the levels by scoring off the lips, tube rides, airs, fast rides, and shoot the pier. Change players and play with different surfers riding different boards, from a big gun power surfer to a lightweight fast short board. You'll be doing airs like a pro in no time, and develop your own surfing style in this surfing simulation. Play with a friend and compete in customizable surf contests like the pro surfing circuit.
